00027 #ifndef MSQ_CYLINDER_DOMAIN_HPP
00028 #define MSQ_CYLINDER_DOMAIN_HPP
00029 
00030 
00031 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00032 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00033 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00036 {
00040   class MESQUITE_EXPORT CylinderDomain : public Mesquite::MeshDomain
00041   {
00042   public:
00048     inline CylinderDomain( double radius,
00049                            Vector3D axis_direction = Vector3D(0,0,1), 
00050                            Vector3D axis_point = Vector3D(0,0,0),
00051                            bool outward_normal = true )
00052       : mAxis( axis_direction / axis_direction.length() ),
00053         mCenter( axis_point ),
00054         mRadius( radius ),
00055         outwardSign( outward_normal ? 1.0 : -1.0 )
00056       { }
00057     
00058     virtual ~CylinderDomain();
00059 
00060     virtual void snap_to(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00061                          Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00062     
00063     virtual void vertex_normal_at(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00064                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00065 
00066     
00067     virtual void element_normal_at(Mesh::ElementHandle entity_handle,
00068                                    Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00069 
00070     
00071     virtual void vertex_normal_at(const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle,
00072                                   Vector3D coords[],
00073                                   unsigned count,
00074                                   MsqError& err) const;
00075 
00076     virtual void closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00077                                 const Vector3D& position,
00078                                 Vector3D& closest,
00079                                 Vector3D& normal,
00080                                 MsqError& err ) const;
00081 
00082     virtual void domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle_array,
00083                              unsigned short* dof_array,
00084                              size_t count,
00085                              MsqError& err ) const;
00086 
00087 
00088     const Vector3D& axis() const { return mAxis; }
00089     const Vector3D& center() const { return mCenter; }
00090     double radius() const { return mRadius; }
00091     
00092   protected:
00093     
00094     virtual void evaluate( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00095                            const Vector3D& point,
00096                            Vector3D& closest,
00097                            Vector3D& normal ) const;
00098     
00099   private:
00100   
00101     Vector3D mAxis;
00102     Vector3D mCenter;
00103     double mRadius;
00104     double outwardSign;
00105   };
